程序包的使用
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper

  • 使用org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coordination  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication
    Multi Cluster Replication Cluster replication documentation has been moved to the link:http://hbase.apache.org/book.html#_cluster_replication[Cluster Replication] section of the link:http://hbase.apache.org/book.html[Apache HBase Reference Guide].
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.hbck  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper  
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    MetaTableLocator
    Utility class to perform operation (get/wait for/verify/set/delete) on znode in ZooKeeper which keeps hbase:meta region server location.
    ZKListener
    Base class for internal listeners of ZooKeeper events.
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coordination使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    ZKListener
    Base class for internal listeners of ZooKeeper events.
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    RegionNormalizerTracker
    Tracks region normalizer state up in ZK
    ZKListener
    Base class for internal listeners of ZooKeeper events.
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    ClusterStatusTracker
    Tracker on cluster settings up in zookeeper.
    MasterAddressTracker
    Manages the location of the current active Master for the RegionServer.
    MetaTableLocator
    Utility class to perform operation (get/wait for/verify/set/delete) on znode in ZooKeeper which keeps hbase:meta region server location.
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    ZKListener
    Base class for internal listeners of ZooKeeper events.
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.hbck使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
  • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper使用的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的类 
    类和说明
    EmptyWatcher
    An empty ZooKeeper watcher
    MetricsZooKeeperSource
    Interface of the source that will export metrics about the ZooKeeper.
    RecoverableZooKeeper
    A zookeeper that can handle 'recoverable' errors.
    ZKConfig.ZKClusterKey 
    ZKListener
    Base class for internal listeners of ZooKeeper events.
    ZKNodeTracker
    Tracks the availability and value of a single ZooKeeper node.
    ZKUtil.NodeAndData
    已过时。 
    Unused
    ZKUtil.ZKUtilOp
    Represents an action taken by ZKUtil, e.g. createAndFailSilent.
    ZKWatcher
    Acts as the single ZooKeeper Watcher.
    ZNodePaths
    Class that hold all the paths of znode for HBase.
